FuncDef: This command specifies the network-queue policy which defines queue parameters such as CBS, high priority only burst size, MBS, CIR and PIR rates, as well as forwarding-class to queue mappings. The network-queue policy is defined in theconfig>qos>network-queuecontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing network-queue policy name. The name can be up to 32 characters long.
